title: Can we not have single queue AND dynamic queue on OCE
body: I already find queue times in ranked on my multiple accounts hard as it is, but since Rito are adding a true solo queue, queue times for both of these are most likely going to be astronomical. Is it possible to leave just dynamic queue or even just have a plain solo queue because otherwise wait times on this server are going to be unbearable.

replies.body:
NO!

Have you ever been in Bronze?

In the higher ranks whoever has the better premade wins, down in the depths of hell it is whoever has the worst premade loses. You get 2-4 man premades on each team and guaranteed you are either going to have donkeys in one of those premades, or a smurf.

From almost 60 ranked games this season, I have had like 4 that were close, the rest were so one sided, they shouldn't have even been games.

2 games come to mind, one game I went 9/1 as Nasus and ended it in like 17 minutes, no one else had anymore than 2 kills. The other game the enemy Graves was something like 6/0 5 minutes and from there we collapsed like a deck of cards.

I don't premade like I used to, I don't at all anymore in fact, so I either go against the shit premade and have a field day, or get smashed 10 minutes in, there is almost no in between.

And the rage you get, those premades who suck ass, they can never admit it was them or their friends who are bad, they have to pick on the other players and blame them regardless of anything. I've even had games as the only player without a negative KDA on my team and doing all the work to carry them, but they still rage at me and blame me for the loss, couldn't possibly be them or their friends fault, it never is.
I have accounts in bronze. You must be the unluckiest person alive coz ive played 100 games at least in bronze this season and yes, I've had shit premades but not every game...

Well the ones I have bothered to check are mostly premade, there have been a game here and there I have checked that is not premade, but not just ranked, normals too.

* 3 man premade last game on my team, 2 man on the enemy team, we lost.
* Game before that premade on the enemy team, none on mine, I coped random abuse from the enemy premade, I said nothing all game to this person, they killed me and started to abuse me non stop calling me a sh*t cu*t constantly amongst others.
* Before that, premade enemy, lost.
* Premade both teams, we lost.
* Premade enemy team, we won.

So there is my last 5 games, 2 of them had a premade on the enemy team only and we lost, the other 3 had premade on enemy or both, all for one win. And that was just my last 5 games played, not the last 5 with a premade.
In dynamic queue I just select fill and get a game in like 20 seconds.
Yeh but fill almost always means support. You may as well just pick support / fill and get good at support.
